Subject: Shortcut keys to check client to server connectivity status
Description:
Good afternoon

Not so long ago I was advised of a series of shorcut keys that you could press on your keyboard in EPP to check the Client to Server connectivity status. Please can you remind me what the keys are.

Many thanks

Mohamed
Solution_Comment__c:
The shortcut keys to press on your keyboard in EPP to check the  Client to Server connectivity status is as follows:
For Mac press: command+option+i
For Windows press: ctlr+alt+i
